amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to enforce the judgement of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Indiana in the case of Russelburg v. Gibson County, decided January 31, 2005, concerning a display of a monument of the Ten Commandments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in the Act from being used to enforce the judgement of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Indiana in the case of Russelburg v. Gibson County, decided January 31, 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 182 (Roll no. 257).
